text: I come from Ocean State in Nigeria but I
lived my whole life in Lagos which is
the biggest city in Nigeria
growing up I always played soccer and
that was something that what we do in
Nigeria I still play soccer even here at
HBS and we have a Harvard HBS soccer
club team
I was also part of the Africa Business
Club
the past year as part of the Africa
business conference I added Sports to
the to the subject matter that we
covered in the conference we actually
organized something around the business
of sports in Africa so this was
something that because of my passion in
sports I was able to put together for
the conference for the first time
when I leave HBS I am moving back to
Nigeria to continue the work on this
soccer education initiative that I
started just before I started school and
my goal is to use the knowledge that
I've built here to help grow this
program into a national program that
impacts a lot of kids and shows them
that they should combine Sports and
education to be able to achieve their
full potential as a longer term I'm
going to be moving to Portland Oregon to
work for Nike as part of their corporate
strategy development team I want to go
to work every day been passionate about
what I'm doing and Nike touches the
lives of pretty much every athlete so
I'm Paula for lower Chalet and I want to
use the knowledge and the business
principles that I've learned at HBS to
impact people's lives through Sports
foreign
